items.title: FG deports 51 foreign nationals convicted of cybercrimes
items.summary: The Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) has, in collaboration with other agencies, deported another batch of 51 foreign nationals convicted of cyber-terrorism, internet fraud, and related financial crimes in Lagos. EFCC Spokesperson, Dele Oyewale, said this in a statement on Sunday in Abuja. Oyewale said the exercise was jointly carried out by the anti-graft […]
